name: Suspicious Scheduled Task Write to System32 Tasks
description: Detects the creation of tasks from processes executed from suspicious locations
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(file.path:*\\Windows\\System32\\Tasks* AND process.executable:(*\\AppData\\* OR *C\:\\PerfLogs* OR *\\Windows\\System32\\config\\systemprofile*))`
